message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds significant value, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your business. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I'm confident that this product is worth at least $1500000 to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1750000. This price reflects the potential value I see in this product for you.  Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further, and I'll be happy to share more information.
